Articles.Content:
I have been playing Bungie's new game Destiny. Beautiful game. As soon as I started the game I noticed a beautiful sight, that what I think would be a great addition to KSP. The very large Colony ships in the background of the Cosmodrome in Old Russia.

If I had any skill at all I would make these massive beauties myself. But alas I don't know how to 3D model or how to make textures. So I put forth this call to the vast community of talented KSP modders to re-create this Colony ship for the great game Kerbal Space Program.

Is there any modder out there that will heed the call?
This is my attempt, I'm not a modder. Just had some fun with stock parts + spherical tanks.

This is my attempt, I'm not a modder. Just had some fun with stock parts + spherical tanks.

http://urchin.earth.li/~andy/ksp.png

Nice, how did it handle?
